name: Golden Frequency
description:
Golden Ratio Meditation - "Phi Frequency" (1.618 Hz)

Re$: 1920 × 1080
Colour Profile: HD (1-1-1)
Duration: 1'

Frequency for grounding, stability, and the expansion of consciousness. The Mandala provides the hypnosis to enter this space and understand with deeper meaning the events that took place, are taking place, and gain wisdom for the ones yet to come.

Guided Medidation:

(perceive the shapes and changes of the Mandala)
As human, I see colours
I perceive time and space
I am aware of the powers which I cannot control
By so releasing myself from the attachment 
Of the emotions that are holding themselves to me.
My past situations, choices and vibrations,
Do not define my Present Self.
I choose to walk the path of the Golden Frequency
And to to separate my past from the Present.
I see the golden light filling my auric body,
And connect deeply to its powers of support.

Through the Golden Frequency 
I let go 
I embrace
I choose my Today.

By acquiring this piece, you are funding a series of courses and guided meditations to promote healing on the Metaverse.
